name: BaseBreakables
_source: speak;Marisa;Been thinkin', haven't we been taking awhile on the battlefield?
speak;Marisa;I mean, there's gotta be an easier way to get through the battlefield! A shortcut!
speak;Kasen;Well, there might be some weak spots in some places we could break down to get access faster.
speak;Marisa;So...we just need to hit it until it breaks?
speak;Reimu;I like the idea of that.
game_var;baseconvolist;[x for x in v('baseconvolist') if not x == 'Breakables']
